mapper.select: /** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.DosingRepository.selectDosingChartByCnstId */ /** 차트번호에 대한 복용차트 정보 조회 */ SELECT DC.DOSG_ID , DC.CNST_ID , DC.DOSG_SEQ , CONCAT(DC.DOSG_SEQ, '일차') AS DOSG_SEQ_STR , DATE_FORMAT(DC.DOSG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DOSG_DT , (SELECT DAYS_STR_KOR FROM TB_COMM_CALENDAR CAL WHERE CAL.BASE_DT_STR = DATE_FORMAT(DC.DOSG_DT, '%Y%m%d')) AS DAYS_STR_KOR , DC.DOSG_LV_CD , (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1014' AND DITC_CD = DC.DOSG_LV_CD AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS DOSG_LV_CD_NM , CALL_YN , (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1016' AND DITC_CD = DC.CALL_YN AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS CALL_YN_NM , DOSG_YN , (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1017' AND DITC_CD = DC.DOSG_YN AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS DOSG_YN_NM , PAUS_YN , (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1021' AND DITC_CD = DC.PAUS_YN AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS PAUS_YN_NM , STOP_YN , (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1028' AND DITC_CD = DC.STOP_YN AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS STOP_YN_NM , MEAL_TP_CD , (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1027' AND DITC_CD = DC.MEAL_TP_CD AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS MEAL_TP_CD_NM , DC.CURR_WGT , DC.LOSS_WGT , DC.RMI_WGT , DC.DOSG_DESC1 , DC.DOSG_DESC2 , DC.REG_DT , DC.REG_USR_NO FROM TB_PP_DOSG_CHART DC INNER JOIN TB_PP_CNST_CHART CC ON CC.CNST_ID = DC.CNST_ID WHERE DC.CNST_ID = #{cnstId} ORDER BY DC.DOSG_ID

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.DosingRepository.selectDosingChartByCallYn */ /** 차트번호에 대한 차트마스터 정보 조회 */ SELECT DOSG_ID , CNST_ID , DOSG_SEQ , CONCAT(DOSG_SEQ, '일차') AS DOSG_SEQ_STR , DATE_FORMAT(DOSG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DOSG_DT , (SELECT DAYS_STR_KOR FROM TB_COMM_CALENDAR CAL WHERE CAL.BASE_DT_STR = DATE_FORMAT(DOSG_DT, '%Y%m%d')) AS DAYS_STR_KOR , DOSG_LV_CD , (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1014' AND DITC_CD = DOSG_LV_CD AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS DOSG_LV_CD_VAL , CALL_YN , (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1016' AND DITC_CD = CALL_YN AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS CALL_YN_NM , DOSG_YN , (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1017' AND DITC_CD = DOSG_YN AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS DOSG_YN_NM , PAUS_YN , (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1021' AND DITC_CD = PAUS_YN AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS PAUS_YN_NM , STOP_YN , (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1028' AND DITC_CD = DC.STOP_YN AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS STOP_YN_NM , MEAL_TP_CD , (SELECT DITC_NM FROM TB_COMM_CODE WHERE GRP_CD = 'C1027' AND DITC_CD = MEAL_TP_CD AND USE_YN = 'Y') AS MEAL_TP_CD_NM , CURR_WGT , LOSS_WGT , RMI_WGT , DOSG_DESC1 , DOSG_DESC2 , REG_DT , REG_USR_NO FROM TB_PP_DOSG_CHART WHERE CALL_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY DOSG_ID

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.DosingRepository.selectDashDosingList01 */ SELECT C.CUST_USR_NM , CASE LENGTH(C.CUST_CELL_NO) WHEN 11 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(C.CUST_CELL_NO, 3), '-', MID('***********', 4, 4), '-', RIGHT(C.CUST_CELL_NO, 4)) WHEN 10 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(C.CUST_CELL_NO, 3), '-', MID('**********' , 4, 3), '-', RIGHT(C.CUST_CELL_NO, 4)) END AS CUST_CELL_NO , C.ADDR1 FROM TB_PP_DOSG_CHART A , TB_PP_CNST_CHART B , TB_CUSTOMER C WHERE A.CNST_ID = B.CNST_ID AND B.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID AND DOSG_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND A.CALL_YN = 'CHEMIST' -- 한약사

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.DosingRepository.selectDashDosingList02 */ SELECT C.CUST_USR_NM , CASE LENGTH(C.CUST_CELL_NO) WHEN 11 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(C.CUST_CELL_NO, 3), '-', MID('***********', 4, 4), '-', RIGHT(C.CUST_CELL_NO, 4)) WHEN 10 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(C.CUST_CELL_NO, 3), '-', MID('**********' , 4, 3), '-', RIGHT(C.CUST_CELL_NO, 4)) END AS CUST_CELL_NO , C.ADDR1 FROM TB_PP_DOSG_CHART A , TB_PP_CNST_CHART B , TB_CUSTOMER C WHERE A.CNST_ID = B.CNST_ID AND B.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID AND DOSG_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND A.CALL_YN = 'COUNSELOR' -- 상담실장

/** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.DosingRepository.selectDashDosingList03 */ SELECT B.CNST_ID , C.CUST_USR_NM , CASE LENGTH(C.CUST_CELL_NO) WHEN 11 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(C.CUST_CELL_NO, 3), '-', MID('***********', 4, 4), '-', RIGHT(C.CUST_CELL_NO, 4)) WHEN 10 THEN CONCAT(LEFT(C.CUST_CELL_NO, 3), '-', MID('**********' , 4, 3), '-', RIGHT(C.CUST_CELL_NO, 4)) END AS CUST_CELL_NO , MAX(ABS(DATEDIFF( dosg_dt, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')))) AS PASS_DAYS , MAX(STR_TO_DATE(DOSG_DT, '%Y%m%d')) as LAST_DOSG_DT FROM TB_PP_DOSG_CHART A , TB_PP_CNST_CHART B , TB_CUSTOMER C WHERE A.CNST_ID = B.CNST_ID AND B.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID AND A.PAUS_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY B.CNST_ID , C.CUST_USR_NM , C.CUST_CELL_NO
mapper.insert: /** com.pharm.chorok.web.main.repository.DosingRepository.insertTbPpDosgChart */ INSERT INTO TB_PP_DOSG_CHART ( CNST_ID , DOSG_SEQ , DOSG_DT , DOSG_LV_CD , CALL_YN , REG_DT , REG_USR_NO ) SELECT #{cnstId} , ROWNUM , BASE_DT_STR , DOSG_LV_CD , '' , now() , #{regUsrNo} FROM ( SELECT A.ROWNUM , CASE WHEN ROWNUM = 0 THEN '0' WHEN ROWNUM <= 3 THEN '1' WHEN ROWNUM <= 7 THEN '2' WHEN ROWNUM <= 14 THEN '3' WHEN ROWNUM <= 21 THEN '4' WHEN ROWNUM <= 28 THEN '5' END AS DOSG_LV_CD , A.BASE_DT_STR FROM ( SELECT CAL.* , @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM TB_COMM_CALENDAR CAL , (SELECT @ROWNUM :=-1) TMP , (SELECT STR_TO_DATE( #{startDosgDt}, '%Y-%m-%d') AS START_DOSING_DT) T WHERE 1 = 1 AND BASE_DT_STR >= DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD( T.START_DOSING_DT, INTERVAL -1 DAY), '%Y%m%d') AND BASE_DT_STR < DATE_ADD( T.START_DOSING_DT, INTERVAL 27 DAY) ) A ORDER BY A.ROWNUM ) A
